exchange = 'Poloniex'

    @allure.title("Connect new exchange")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize(**CredentialsParams.ddt_exchange_value)
    def test_connect_exchange(self, page: Page, create_session, exchange):
        login_page = LoginPage(page)
        credentials_page = CredentialsPage(page)
        notifications = Notifications(page)
        api_key = {
            "Binance": cfg.BINANCE_API_KEY,
            "Poloniex": cfg.POLONIEX_API_KEY,
            "HitBTC": cfg.HITBTC_API_KEY,
        }
        secret_key = {
            "Binance": cfg.BINANCE_SECRET_KEY,
            "Poloniex": cfg.POLONIEX_SECRET_KEY,
            "HitBTC": cfg.HITBTC_SECRET_KEY,
        }
    
        toast_message = "Credentials was successfully created."
    
        with allure.step("Test preparation"):
            login_page.goto()
            create_session()
    
        with allure.step("Go to credentials page"):
            credentials_page.goto(endpoint=credentials_page.slug)
    
        with allure.step("Open connect exchange modal"):
            credentials_page.click_connect_exchange_btn()
            assert credentials_page.wait_for_connect_exchange_modal() is True
    
        with allure.step("Enter exchange data"):
            credentials_page.select_exchange(exchange)
            credentials_page.insert_api_key(api_key.get(exchange))
            credentials_page.insert_secret_key(secret_key.get(exchange))
            credentials_page.insert_exchange_comment(self.exchange_comment.get(exchange))
            credentials_page.click_save_btn()
    
        with allure.step("Verify connecting exchange"):
>           assert notifications.wait_for_success_toast() is True
